Uses of Interface
android.view.inputmethod.InputConnection

Packages that use InputConnection
android.inputmethodservice Base classes for writing input methods. 
android.view Provides classes that expose basic user interface classes that handle screen layout and interaction with the user. 
android.view.inputmethod Framework classes for interaction between views and input methods (such as soft keyboards). 
android.widget The widget package contains (mostly visual) UI elements to use on your Application screen.

Methods in android.inputmethodservice that return InputConnection
 InputConnection InputMethodService.getCurrentInputConnection()
          Retrieve the currently active InputConnection that is bound to the input method, or null if there is none.

Uses of InputConnection in android.view.inputmethod
 

Classes in android.view.inputmethod that implement InputConnection
 class BaseInputConnection
          Base class for implementors of the InputConnection interface, taking care of implementing common system-oriented parts of the functionality.
 class InputConnectionWrapper
          Wrapper around InputConnection interface, calling through to another implementation of it.
(package private) static class InputMethodManager.NoOpInputConnection
           
 class MutableInputConnectionWrapper
          Special version of InputConnectionWrapper that allows the base input connection to be modified after it is initially set.
